title: VK API JSON Schema - objects
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API - objects

additional_address.description: Additional address to the place (6 floor, left door)

time_offset.description: Time offset int minutes from utc time

break_close_time.description: Close time of the break in minutes

break_open_time.description: Start time of the break in minutes

date.description: Date when user has been added to blacklist in Unixtime

end_date.description: Date when user will be removed from blacklist in Unixtime

api_version.description: API version used for the events

is_admin.description: Information whether current user is administrator

is_member.description: Information whether current user is member

is_advertiser.description: Information whether current user is advertiser

photo_50.description: URL of square photo of the community with 50 pixels in width

photo_100.description: URL of square photo of the community with 100 pixels in width

photo_200.description: URL of square photo of the community with 200 pixels in width

photo_200_orig.description: URL of square photo of the community with 200 pixels in width original

photo_400.description: URL of square photo of the community with 400 pixels in width

photo_400_orig.description: URL of square photo of the community with 400 pixels in width original

photo_max.description: URL of square photo of the community with max pixels in width

photo_max_orig.description: URL of square photo of the community with max pixels in width original

groups_group_admin_level.description: Level of current user's credentials as manager

end_date.description: End date of ban in Unixtime

is_hidden_from_feed.description: Information whether community is hidden from current user's newsfeed

is_favorite.description: Information whether community is in faves

is_subscribed.description: Information whether current user is subscribed

members_count_text.description: Info about number of users in group

requests_count.description: The number of incoming requests to the community

can_post.description: Information whether current user can post on community's wall

can_upload_story.description: Information whether current user can upload story

can_call_to_community.description: Information whether current user can call to community

can_upload_doc.description: Information whether current user can upload doc

can_upload_video.description: Information whether current user can upload video

can_upload_clip.description: Information whether current user can upload clip

can_see_all_posts.description: Information whether current user can see all posts on community's wall

can_create_topic.description: Information whether current user can create topic

activity.description: Type of group, start date of event or category of public page

crop_photo.description: Данные о точках, по которым вырезаны профильная и миниатюрная фотографии сообщества

wall.description: Information about wall status in community

trending.description: Information whether the community has a "fire" pictogram.

can_message.description: Information whether current user can send a message to community

is_messages_blocked.description: Information whether community can send a message to current user

can_send_notify.description: Information whether community can send notifications by phone number to current user

online_status.description: Status of replies in community messages

is_subscribed_podcasts.description: Information whether current user is subscribed to podcasts

video_notifications_status.description: Information about the status of video notifications for the current user.

edit_title.description: Information whether the link title can be edited

photo_100.description: URL of square image of the link with 100 pixels in width

photo_50.description: URL of square image of the link with 50 pixels in width

image_processing.description: Information whether the image on processing

is_enabled.description: Information whether live covers is enabled

is_scalable.description: Information whether live covers photo scaling is enabled

api_version.description: API version used for the events

is_enabled.description: Shows whether Long Poll is enabled

enabled.description: Information whether the market is enabled

has_market_app.description: Information whether community has installed market app

groups_market_state.description: Declares state if market is enabled in group.

is_call_operator.description: Allow the manager to accept community calls.

member.description: Information whether user is a member of the group

can_invite.description: Information whether user can be invited

can_recall.description: Information whether user's invite to the group can be recalled

invitation.description: Information whether user has been invited to the group

member.description: Information whether user is a member of the group

request.description: Information whether user has send request to the group

minutes.description: Estimated time of answer (for status = answer_mark)

groups_online_status_type.description: Type of online status of group

group.description: Information about group if type = group

profile.description: Information about group if type = profile
